name: Ruins of the Forgotten
description:
You are an young viking from a nearby village sent to find the source of the awoken skeletons. Use your trusty bow to vanquish foes and use your old shield to protect yourself from danger.

Controller:

Left thumbstick - Movement

Right thumbstick - Weapon/Shield aim

Right/Left bumper : Next/Previous  item/weapon

Keyboard/Mouse: (Works but no mouse aim)

WASD - Movement

Arrow keys - Aim in 45 degree snaps

Mouse - Click Menus

Mouse scroll - Next/Previous item/weapon

1 - Shield

2 - Bow

3 - Fire staff (when found)

Used marketplace assets:

POLYGON : Vikings Pack

POLYGON: Dungeons

Soundly SFX

Music : Linus Eldstål
